title: Article 370 | Official Teaser | Yami Gautam, Priyamani | 23rd Feb 2024 | Jio Studios | B62 Studios | Video Trailer - Bollywood Hungama
text: About the video U With honour and pride, we present to you a powerful narrative inspired by true events that shaped the fate of Kashmir and made India stronger thanâ€¦ With honour and pride, we present to you a powerful narrative inspired by true events that shaped the fate of Kashmir and made India stronger than ever. #Article370 releasing in cinemas on 23rd February 2024. Jio Studios Presents A B62 Studios Production Article 370 Produced by Jyoti Deshpande Produced by Aditya Dhar & Lokesh Dhar Directed by Aditya Suhas Jambhale Cast #YamiGautam, Priya Mani, Skand Thakur, Ashwini Koul, Vaibhav Tatwawadi, Arun Govil, Kiran Karmarkar, Divya Seth, Raj Zutshi, Sumit Kaul, Raj Arjun, Jaya Virlley, Asit Gopinath Redij, Sanya Sagar, Irawati Harshe Story, Screenplay & Dialogues Aditya Dhar & Monal Thaakar Screenplay & Dialogues Aditya Suhas Jambhale & Arjun Dhawan Additional Screenplay Aarsh Vora Executive Producer Puneet Wadan Music Shashwat Sachdev Editor Shivkumar V.Panicker DOP Siddharth Vasani PD Yantra Designs Casting Mukesh Chabbra Costume Veera Kapur Music Label Saregama
